alert.note: Alert for Collin; Cooke; Denton; Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 12:11AM CDT until June 16 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Denton County in north central Texas... Northwestern Collin County in north central Texas... Southeastern Cooke County in north central Texas... Southwestern Grayson County in north central Texas... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1210 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pilot Point, moving east at 40 mph. At 1209 AM, golf ball size hail was repoted in Pilot Point. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 65 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... McKinney, Frisco, Denton, Allen, Prosper, Celina, Pilot Point, Van Alstyne, Howe, Aubrey, Krugerville, Cross Roads, Gunter, Ray Roberts Park Isle Du Bois, Tioga, Weston, Lincoln Park, Elmont, Providence Village and Lake Ray Roberts. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
